"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unser persönliches daten für ihre eigenen zwecke sammeln und verkaufen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data for their own purposes? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and selling personal data without proper consent or regard for privacy. it questions the lack of adequate measures to protect individuals' personal information and highlights the need for better data protection policies and regulations. the use of hashtags such as #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) allows the post to reach a wider audience and connect with others who are concerned about this issue.
